name: Lobbying Africa Limited
headAddress: 2nd Floor College House, 17 King Edwards Road
goal:
Lobbying Africa is a company based in London that operates mostly in African countries, doing lobby for our clientes (between private ones, companies or even Governments of African Countries).
Our work is developed mostly with clients that are from Europe and want to have implement a business, grow them. However, we do some operations that work in the opposite direction, people or governments from Africa that want to do business ou carry a mission on Europe.
We intermediate the operations between our clients and the target, making a lobby work ensuring that our clients needs are perceived as the best by de decision-maker. So, we serve as a carrier and spokesperson for the interest of our clients near several organisms, including some European (e.g. European Investment Bank).
We stand by a highly strict ethics and rules code, that only allow us to work following every laws and with clients that comply at any moment with it.
Our ultimate goal as a company is to help our clients to get the best opportunity for their businesses, missions or goals.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Migration and asylum
euInitiatives: EU Development Cooperation Policy; EU Migration Policies; European External Investment Plan; EU-Africa Policies
